name: GDPR READY ADVICE
author: Webpsilon S.L.

sections.description:
Really simple free and responsive widget for your site. Show a tiny banner in your footer to let visitors know that your site is GDPR compliant.

As simple as that. Plug & play installation. Install, activate and widget will be automatically added in your footer.

¡IMPORTANT!
Activating this plugin does not guarantee that you meet your responsibilities and obligations with the GDPR law. Organizations should follow their particular responsibilities and ensure that additional measures are taken to meet all the obligations required by law.

This is just a notification message for your visitors, nothing else. Simple plugin.
sections.installation:
Quick-tips section that describes how to install the plugin and get it working in less than 5 minutes!

  1. Login to your WordPress administration site
  2. Install the plugin via the plugins menu in your WordPress admin panel or adding it to your “plugins” folder via FTP
  3. Activate it and you’ll see a new menu option in “Settings” called “GDPR Ready Advice”
  4. Enter to the GDPR Ready Advice settings, set up your privacy policy page and save
sections.faq:
• What can I customize on GDPR Ready Advice?
  • Privacy policy URL
  • More to come in the future
  • Plugin License: GPLv2 or later / WordPress

Installation Instructions

Quick-tips section that describes how to install the plugin and get it working in less than 5 minutes!

  1. Login to your WordPress administration site
  2. Install the plugin via the plugins menu in your WordPress admin panel or adding it to your “plugins” folder via FTP
  3. Activate it and you’ll see a new menu option in “Settings” called “GDPR Ready Advice”
  4. Enter to the GDPR Ready Advice settings, set up your privacy policy page and save
